title: Starcraft 2: The WORST Grand Finals Ever? (Serral vs Rogue)
excerpt: Best-of-7 series of professional StarCraft 2 between Rogue (Zerg) and Serral (Zerg). People are calling this Grand Finals of the TSL 8 the worst finals ever.
